Name: Dustin Parker
Professional Summary: Highly skilled and experienced Information Technology professional with over 24 years of experience. Expertise in full-stack web development (JavaScript, PHP, HTML, CSS), server administration, network management, and multimedia equipment operations. Proven ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously, troubleshoot complex technical issues, and lead a team in achieving successful technology implementations.

Experience.Title: Information Technology Lead
Experience.Description: Solely responsible for all church technology, including IP phone systems, local network, computer and server management, online portal management (Office 365 environment), hybrid network environment, multimedia equipment. Lead the Multimedia department, overseeing all technology aspects of Sunday services and livestreams.

Experience.Title: PHP Backend Programmer
Experience.Description: Develop websites and create AJAX response APIs.

Experience.Title: Javascript Developer
Experience.Description: Proficient in JavaScript since 2000. Experienced with various frameworks and libraries, creating some custom libraries as well. Possess knowledge of additional front-end and back-end languages for full-stack development, enabling independent project completion.

Experience.Title: Lab Instructor
Experience.Description: Community education lab instructor for Microsoft Office Suite.

Experience.Title: Network Administrator Assistant
Experience.Description: Responsible for school server maintenance and repair, student computer upkeep, and participation in the college's Remote Deployment Server system development.
